title: Provision for the poor, or, Reasons for the erecting of a working-hospital in every county as the most necessary and onely effectual expedient to promote the linnen manufactory, with comfortable maintenance for all poor and distressed people in citie and country by which all beggars, vagrants, &c. throughout the nation, may speedily be restrained, and forever prevented : in pursuance to certain proposals to the King and Parliament.
author: Haines, Richard, 1633-1685.
notes: Attributed to Richard Haines by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
